typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		jsonString as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 parse(stringJson = jsonString ? ({Referrer URL} as string,
		{Query Parameters} as string)
		,
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Parse1
